title: Banana chocolate chip loaf cake
ingredients: ['250g plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '3 ripe bananas, mashed', '1 tablespoon milk', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, or to taste', '110g butter, softened', '200g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '170g dark chocolate chips']
